title: Contact details
subtitle-1: Here you can indicate and change the digital contact details to which {{recipient}} will receive notifications. If you are looking for company data
alert-dialog-EMAIL: If the company does not have a PEC and one of its users accesses the SEND notification within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the email, the acknowledgement of receipt will not be sent by registered letter.
alert-dialog-SMS: If the company does not have a PEC and one of its users accesses the SEND notification within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the SMS, the acknowledgement of receipt will not be sent by registered letter.

legal-contacts.subtitle: Legal address
legal-contacts.description: When there is a notification for the company, the acknowledgement of receipt is sent to this address. In order to read the notification and pay any fees, it is necessary to log on to the platform.
legal-contacts.description-2: Receive acknowledgements of receipt of notifications in your PEC. Log on to SEND to read them and pay any fees.
legal-contacts.link-aar: What is an acknowledgement of receipt?
legal-contacts.pec-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the PEC address indicated. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
legal-contacts.pec-new-code: Haven't received it? Check that you have entered the correct PEC or
legal-contacts.remove-pec-message: Are you sure you want to remove the PEC address {{value}}?
legal-contacts.disclaimer-message: This is the primary address at which the company will receive acknowledgements of receipt. By entering it, you will no longer receive recommendations.
legal-contacts.block-remove-pec-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the PEC addresses that you indicated under "Other contact details".
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-title: Do you want to cancel the verification?
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-content: If you cancel the verification, you will have to enter a new PEC and start the process again.
legal-contacts.validation-progress-title: Thank you, now it's our turn
legal-contacts.validation-progress-content: We are verifying that the address you entered is a valid PEC for receiving notifications from the Public Administration. You will receive the outcome of the verification via email.
legal-contacts.disclaimer-message-unavailable: Download the IO app, log in and make sure that the SEND "Digital notifications" service is active

enable-modal.title: Do you want to activate the "Digital notifications" service on IO?
enable-modal.content: If you do not have a PEC and access the notification within 5 days (120 hours) of sending the message, you will not receive the acknowledgement of receipt by registered letter.

disable-modal.title: Do you want to deactivate the "Digital notifications" service on IO?
disable-modal.content: When you receive a notification, you will no longer receive an in-app message.

courtesy-contacts.subtitle: Email or SMS
courtesy-contacts.description: When there is a notification for the company, a message is sent to these contacts. In order to read the notification and pay any fees, it is necessary to log on to the platform.
courtesy-contacts.email-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated email address. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.phone-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated mobile number. The code is valid for 10 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.email-new-code: Haven't received it? Check that you have entered the correct email or
courtesy-contacts.phone-new-code: Haven't received it? Check that you have entered the correct mobile number or
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-message: Are you sure you want to remove the email address {{value}}?
courtesy-contacts.remove-phone-message: Are you sure you want to remove the mobile number {{value}}?
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the email addresses that you indicated under "Other contact details".
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-phone-title: You cannot delete the phone number
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-phone-message: In order to do this, you must first delete all the telephone numbers that you indicated under "Other contact details".
courtesy-contacts.disclaimer-message: If the company is not reachable by PEC and one of its users immediately reads the notification, they will not receive the acknowledgement of receipt by registered letter.

special-contacts.subtitle: If you want notifications from some organisations to be addressed to different contact details, you can indicate them here, replacing the main ones.
special-contacts.pec-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with a PEC address. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you have just indicated.
special-contacts.phone-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with a mobile number. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you have just indicated.
special-contacts.email-already-exists: This organisation is already associated with an email address. If you press "Continue", it will be replaced by the one you have just indicated.
special-contacts.fetch-party-error: We were unable to retrieve the data needed to create a new contact.

common.duplicate-contact-descr: The contact {{value}} is already present, do you want to proceed anyway?

invalid_verification_code.title: The code is incorrect
invalid_verification_code.message: Check it and enter it again, or generate another one.

retry_limit_code.title: You have made too many attempts
retry_limit_code.message: You have entered the wrong code too many times. To try again, press "Cancel", make sure that the contact is correct and enter the new code.

expired_verification_code.title: The code has expired
expired_verification_code.message: Generate a new one and enter it.
